emailSubject: Assessment invitation to the Grameenphone Talent Games
emailTemplate:
Dear Candidate,
Welcome to the Grameenphone Talent Games!

We will be taking you through a Gamified Assessment Center. Your decisions and actions throughout the game will help us know you just a little bit better. 

To attempt the online assessment, please click here. Please note that the time period for registration and completing the assessment/game is limited and should not take more than 60 minutes. The game will go live at 12:00 PM and will be closed at 01:30 PM. Any completion beyond this will not be accepted.


Please note that you will need to have a LinkedIn account in order to complete the registration process. If you do not have one, we suggest that you create one now in advance.


For any technical queries, please write to recruitment@grameenphone.com and info@c-factor.live.


Best of Luck


GP HR
name: GrameenPhone3
title: GrameenPhone
